mapper.select: SELECT b.mes_book_code1, b.mes_book_code2, b.mes_book_code3, u.like_id, u.user_seq, u.user_name, b.bom_name, bk.book_name, bk.book_img, li.li_book_info, bu.buser_seq, bu.buser_date, bu.buser_end, bk.book_pub, bk.book_author FROM bom b LEFT JOIN tbl_user u ON b.bom_code = (u.like_id + 1000) LEFT JOIN mes_book m ON (m.mes_book_code = b.mes_book_code1 OR m.mes_book_code = b.mes_book_code2 OR m.mes_book_code = b.mes_book_code3) LEFT JOIN book bk ON m.book_isbn = bk.book_isbn LEFT JOIN li_book li ON bk.book_isbn = li.book_isbn LEFT JOIN bookflix_user bu ON u.user_seq = bu.user_seq WHERE u.user_seq = #{seq} GROUP BY b.mes_book_code1, b.mes_book_code2, b.mes_book_code3, u.like_id, u.user_seq, u.user_name, b.bom_name, bk.book_name, bk.book_img, li.li_book_info, bk.book_pub, bk.book_author, bu.buser_date, bu.buser_end, bu.buser_seq
